title: Is steam a pure substance? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here’s an answer from Rishi Anand, Entrepreneur Ingeniur Innovator Developer Here is his answer to a same question posted on Quora. A pure substance is a substance of constant chemical composition throughout its mass. It may exist in one or more phases. Steam is the gaseous form of water. It may refer to dry steam or super-heated steam which is formed above the boiling point of water (single phase), or wet steam which forms below the boiling point and contains vapor and liquid water (two phase). The chemical composition of steam is always the same, H2O.[math]H2O.[/math] Thus steam is a pure substance.
